Nordeus - http://nordeus.com | Belgrade, Serbia | ONSITE

We are a gaming company looking for a couple of roles, such as: - Senior Data Scientist - UI Designer - Lead Game Designer (more at nordeus.com/careers)

The best thing about working at Nordeus is the ability to choose the games you want to make and having huge influence on the final product. There is a relocation package in place that covers everything you need to get settled, as well as all kinds of perks and benefits you might expect.

If you want to learn more, feel free to contact me at misad[at]nordeus[dot]com.
